For 420 hits only 33 above were on lines (at some point the ball almost rolled on left semi circle which was a lot of hits)

Let's devide into 6 bins (dice) 2/6 = 0.3333
bins - ranges
1 - [-1, -0.6666667]
2 - [-0.6666666, -0.3333333]
3 - [-0.3333333, 0]
4 - [0, 0.3333333]
5 - [0.3333333, 0.6666666]
5 - [0.6666666, 1]

for our results we got
bins - count
1 - 9,
2 - 4,
3 - 1,
4 - 6,
4 - 7,
6 - 6,

We have only one from 3'rd bin and 9 from 1'st bin so it is not uniform

MEAN is -0.01041590334797077
Variance is 0.42751917041719373
